title: Agilent’s Net-Zero Emissions Targets Approved by the Science Based Targets Initiative - ESG Today
summary: Agilent Technologies, a global leader in analytical and clinical laboratory technologies, has announced its near and long-term targets for reaching net-zero greenhouse gas emissions, which have been approved by the Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi). These targets support the company's ambition to limit global warming to 1.5°C above pre-industrial levels. Agilent has already made significant progress in reducing its emissions through investments in renewable energy sources, energy-efficient systems and technology, and a plan to reduce Scope 3 emissions in its supply chain.
product_or_process: Agilent's net-zero emission target plan and associated initiatives.

title: Allegro MicroSystems Completes Acquisition of Crocus Technology to Accelerate Innovation in TMR Sensing Technology - GlobeNewswire
summary: Allegro MicroSystems has acquired Crocus Technology, a leader in Tunnel Magnetoresistance (TMR) sensor technology, for $420 million. This acquisition strengthens Allegro's position in the magnetic sensing market and expands their TMR roadmap, allowing them to leverage the technology in high-growth areas like e-Mobility, Clean Energy, and Automation.
